title: The Longest Journey 2 - Dreamfall [DVD-NeverRAR-NoCD] (re-upload
description:
Since the old one was gone, I&#039;m now uploading this again. And I&#039;ve started seeding again. Hopefully more seeders will come and help (since I uploaded a terabyte myself last time).

Anyways, it&#039;s an adventure game. Ya, that about sums it up. :)

Based upon the Plex group&#039;s CD-release. The no-cd crack from Reloaded is included. All .nfo-files are included as well. Everything can be found on the disc (mounted or burnt).
